#summary Readme for the Post Format Converter

_The Post Format Converter was developed to give public players a perfectly structured template which they only have to fill out. With many features, click-to-open pages for even faster uploading of screenshots/replays and links to several rules of the community it is the ultimate tool for every user not familiar with the community guidelines/how a forum works._

<wiki:toc max_depth="4" />

==== What's needed to fill out? ====
• Ban Request
    * Defendants name & gateway
    * At least one proof (replay/stats link/screenshot)
    * At least one violated rule

• Unban Appeal
    * Your account & gateway
    * The reason to get unbanned

• Complain Format
    * Your account
    * the specific complain
    * the reason for the complain
    * the reason in general

• Staff complain
    * Your account
    * Defendants account & gateway
    * His staff position
    * At least one proof (replay/stats link/screenshot)

==== Features ====

    * Left click on the text _Stats link_ and it will open the stats link of !BlinkGamingNetwork in your default browser. You can click on _Replay_ and _Screenshot_ as well.

    * If you write down the first later of a violated rule and *then* select the arrow of the box, you'll get the rules starting with the letter. The first result will also be put into the field. *This also works for the account fields.*

    * With Tab you can switch between the fields

    * With Alt you can enable temporarily the hotkeys of the buttons

==== Settings ====
    * Version _(Will be overwritten)_
    * !DefaultRules _(Will be overwritten)_

The following settings will be saved and added to the new settings: Types, Positions, Accounts, Defendants, !ClearFields1, !ClearFields2, ssLink, replayLink, statsLink

    * !ClearFields1 _(If enabled (1), it clears all fields in the ban request format after pressed 'Convert')_
    * !ClearFields2 _(If enabled (1), it clears all fields in the ban appeal format after pressed 'Convert')_
    * ssLink - Screenshot link to open if pressed on the text field
    * replayLink - Opens the link to upload a replay
    * statsLink - Runs the BGN's game stats page

All these links can be modified to your own needs.
